ygData.msgSnippet: ... She walked and stood next to Vulois. She looked down. Can you ever forgive this cowardly bat? I have broughtdishonor on myself for fleeing when I should

::Battera::

She walked and stood next to Vulois.
She looked down. "Can you ever forgive this cowardly bat? I have 
broughtdishonor on myself for fleeing when I should have fought next 
to you.  I should have died with you instead of running away. You 
have the right to kill me if you with to do so."
She knelt down and bowed her head.  She waited for a blade to slice 
through her neck.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> 
> Brix and Octociz
> 
> Brix/Octociz rode up toward the Cybertronian Fire. They pulled up 
> beside it, and sent a message to within.
> 
> 
> "Hello? Is anyone there? This is Brix, formely known as Bronco. I 
> have the spark of Octociz inside of me, and if it isn't removed 
soon 
> we will both die. It has been a hard two weeks, and our circuts are 
> almost out. We are both loyal maximals, so do not think we will 
hurt 
> any of you. Please, we need your help."
> 
> Vulois
> 
> Vulois sits around the embassy, and then reaches the inevitable.
> 
> "It looks as if my chosen three have decided not to come. I must 
> continue alone."
> 
> He sends a message to every bot on the planet.
> 
> "Everyone, listen. Maximal, Predacon, Alliance or any other 
faction, 
> listen. This is Vulois. We have all been fighting a stupid war. 
> Cybertron is crumbling, and we are the only ones who can save it. I 
> know, because I have recently been inside The Matrix. I have felt 
> it's despair. The only way we can rebuild Cybertron is if we all 
> unite, as one. We harness the energon together, and than return to 
> Cybertron and unify everyone under beast modes. Please, I beg of 
you, 
> come to my co-ordinates and join in the very first Embassy meeting. 
> You many not want to come yet. I can understand. But please think 
> about it. Even if you here what we have to say, you don't have to 
> follow it. Please, just come and listen."
> 
> He sits and waits.
